text: taṅṅaḷuṭe tanne kaikaḷ nēratte pravartticcatinṟe phalamāyi valla vipattuṁ avare bādhiccāl avar iṅṅane paṟayātirikkānāṇ nāṁ ninne ayaccat: "ñaṅṅaḷuṭe nāthā, ñaṅṅaḷilēkk oru dūtane ninakk niyēāgiccukūṭāyirunnēā? eṅkil ñaṅṅaḷ ninṟe kalpanakaḷ pinpaṟṟukayuṁ satyaviśvāsikaḷiluḷppeṭukayuṁ ceyyumāyirunnallēā
